description: red, white and blue striped women's leggings are bordered with light blue and pink checkerboard stripes, which flank a center filled with metallic rose beads.  A broad navy flannel band and red flannel strips at the sides and bottom inhance the color scheme.  Red and white cotton fabric backs the work.  The translucent seed beads are applied to the hide in both the lazy and overlay stitch.
medium: glass beads, tanned hide, wool, cotton fabric, sinew
title: Woman's Leggings
